name: Simple Satchel bag pattern
description:
Sew this easy organizer bag in just one afternoon! 

It’s bright, functional, and will hold everything...a cell phone, iPad, books, gym clothes, baby stuff, and more!

Adjustable strap...wear it crossbody or on your shoulder. Perfect for beginners.

name: Bloomin' Happy Quilt Pattern
description:
Pattern to make a quilt in TWO sizes! 74”x92” and 72”x72”

Appliqué these bright happy designs on large background blocks for a stunning display of color!  Use your favorite method of appliqué (try it even raw-edge, for a fast cozy look) and choose a bright array of fabrics to make your quilt bloom with fun and happiness.

name: Hip Happier Floral fabric
description:
"Hip Happier" is our NEWEST fabric collection from Henry Glass Fabrics. 

True to the Lizzie B style this collection is oozing with bright citrusy color and ﬂow. Our signature fabric, a large flower design bursting with swirls and paisley drops, sets the tone.  Add to it a mix of bold bright prints and a fabulous selection of black and white coordinates and you get a 20 piece collection full of creativity, imagination, and unlimited possibilities!

This floral is available in a yellow background, aqua background, or a gray colorway.   SORRY, THE AQUA IS SOLD OUT!

100% cotton, quilt shop quality, luscious fabric!  40-42" wide.

Your fabric will arrive in one cut... For example, If you'd like 1.5 yards, then enter a quantity of "1 yard" AND "1/2 yard". You will receive one piece of fabric measuring 1.5 yards.

SKU's 7901-33 yellow, 7905-56 aqua, 7901-99 gray

name: I Heart London quilt pattern
description:
Sew up this fast and fabulous quilt in a juicy array of colors!  Use up your scraps or start with your favorite bundle of fat quarters. The raw-edge technique is easy (great for beginning quilters!) and it makes an oh-so-cozy quilt when washed.

Finished quilt measures 66" x 82".

This pattern is a PDF download only...it will not be shipped in the mail! (NO shipping charges!) After checkout, you'll instantly receive an email from Pulley with a link to download the pattern. You'll be sewing in no time!

You will need:
12 fat quarters
24 different fabrics, 1/4 yard each for flag stripes
2 yards white fabric for sashing and borders
Twin-size batting and quilt backing

name: Happy Scrappy Hexies Quilt Pattern
description:
Love the look of hexies but don’t love complicated cutting or sewing angles? Then this quilt is for YOU!
Easy raw-edge applique, simple enough for a beginner. Sew up this fun soft quilt with a stack of FQ’s...you won’t believe how easy it can be!

Pattern to make a quilt 51" x 68"

This pattern is available as an instant PDF download (you print at home) OR a traditional packaged pattern (we will ship it to you, at NO additional shipping cost).

If you choose the PDF download: After checkout, you'll instantly receive an email with the subject "Your Order is Ready" with a link to download the pattern. You'll be sewing in no time!

name: Whimsyland BOOK
description:
REGULAR PRICE $26.95  ON SALE!  Now $14.00

• 10 unique projects, with complete templates, 112 page book
• One fabulous large quilt, two wonderful small quilts
• Home-dec...make a beanbag, duvet cover, fleur rug
• Quirky stories, recipe, music list, and more!
• Technique instructions included
• Softcover, 112 pages, full color, publisher Kansas City Star Books

Lizzie B's first book filled with ideas and creativity to jump-start your quilting and home-dec projects! Get to know the Lizzie B girls as you read their quirky stories and work on the many projects they created for this jaunt into their whimsical world. The Applique the Lizzie B Way instructions will have you stitching in no time. The patterns youll find between these pages go from the easy Stick it To Me Baby pin cushion that will put a smile on your face as it brightens up your sewing table; to the take-em-with you wall hangings, Be Inspired and Laugh a Good Laugh. Need a little splashy addition to your home? How about the fast and fabulous Topsy-Turvy Duvet cover? Or a little Fleur Rug? Perhaps you have a corner in a room just begging for a comfy Lizzie Bean Bag Chair? Make a batch of their favorite cookies, and pop in some tunes from their jazzy playlist while you stitch the fantastical Whimsyland quilt. Whether youre laughing at how two girls with the same name became sisters, the top 10 things they have in common, or how a design was born out of a childhood...Liz and Beth hope that you enjoy the journey into their little world. Whatever life holds in store, they hope this little book will remind you to smile and laugh often, be inspired and inspire others, and above all, always, always, Be Cre8ive!

name: Hip Happier Daisy fabric
description:
"Hip Happier" is our NEWEST fabric collection from Henry Glass Fabrics. 

This tiny daisy print is available in yellow, lime, and black.

100% cotton, quilt shop quality, luscious fabric!  40-42" wide.

Your fabric will arrive in one cut... For example, If you'd like 1.5 yards, then enter a quantity of "1 yard" AND "1/2 yard". You will receive one piece of fabric measuring 1.5 yards.

SKU 7902-33, 7902-66 lime, 7902-99 black

name: Hip Happier Mod Swirl fabric
description:
"Hip Happier" is our NEWEST fabric collection from Henry Glass Fabrics.

This modern swirl fabric is available in pink/orange, turquoise/lime, and black & white.

100% cotton, quilt shop quality, luscious fabric!  40-42" wide.

Your fabric will arrive in one cut... For example, If you'd like 1.5 yards, then enter a quantity of "1 yard" AND "1/2 yard". You will receive one piece of fabric measuring 1.5 yards.

SKU 7903-22 pink, 7903-56 turquoise, 7903-99 black

name: Hip Happier Check fabric
description:
"Hip Happier" is our NEWEST fabric collection from Henry Glass Fabrics. 


This fun wonky check is the perfect complement to the collection. Available in pink/orange and turquoise/lime.

100% cotton, quilt shop quality, luscious fabric!  40-42" wide.

Your fabric will arrive in one cut... For example, If you'd like 1.5 yards, then enter a quantity of "1 yard" AND "1/2 yard". You will receive one piece of fabric measuring 1.5 yards.

SKU 7904-22 pink, 7904-56 turquoise

name: Hip Happier Dot fabric
description:
"Hip Happier" is our NEWEST fabric collection from Henry Glass Fabrics. True to the Lizzie B style this collection is oozing with bright citrusy color and ﬂow. 

This fun dot is available in orange, turquoise, and black.

100% cotton, quilt shop quality, luscious fabric!  40-42" wide.

Your fabric will arrive in one cut... For example, If you'd like 1.5 yards, then enter a quantity of "1 yard" AND "1/2 yard". You will receive one piece of fabric measuring 1.5 yards.

SKU's 7905-38 orange, 7905-56 turquoise, 7905-99 black

name: Hip Happier Swirl fabric
description:
"Hip Happier" is our NEWEST fabric collection from Henry Glass Fabrics.

This gorgeous swirl is the perfect complement to the collection. Available in orange, turquoise, and lime.

100% cotton, quilt shop quality, luscious fabric!  40-42" wide.

Your fabric will arrive in one cut... For example, If you'd like 1.5 yards, then enter a quantity of "1 yard" AND "1/2 yard". You will receive one piece of fabric measuring 1.5 yards.

SKU 7907-38 orange, 7907-56 turquoise, 7907-66 lime

name: Hip Happier Stripe fabric
description:
"Hip Happier" is our NEWEST fabric collection from Henry Glass Fabrics. 

This gorgeous stripe is perfect for borders or bindings.  Available in pink, turquoise, or gray.

100% cotton, quilt shop quality, luscious fabric!  40-42" wide.

Your fabric will arrive in one cut... For example, If you'd like 1.5 yards, then enter a quantity of "1 yard" AND "1/2 yard". You will receive one piece of fabric measuring 1.5 yards.

SKU 7906-22 pink, 7906-56 turquoise, 7906-99 gray

name: Shades of Summer Quilt Pattern
description:
This bright, scrappy quilt sews up in a jiffy!  The technique is "quilt-as-you-go" ...which means as you sew, you are also quilting.  So when the quilt top is finished, it's also quilted and ready to bind.
When you need to finish a quilt fast....THIS is the pattern you need!

Finished quilt size is 58" x 69".

name: Vogue Panel fabric
description:
PANEL IS ON SALE!

"Vogue" is our previous fabric collection from Henry Glass Fabrics. A sophisticated group of florals, geometrics, and architectural elements inspired by the fashion districts of New York City and Paris.

This panel is the centerpiece of the collection, filled with cameos, fashion elements, and inspiring messages.  Available in red or blue, the panel consists of 2/3 yard of fabric, approximately  24" x 42".

100% cotton, quilt shop quality, luscious fabric!  


SKU 7730-88 red   7730-77 blue

name: You Are Everything quilt pattern
description:
This little quilt just says it all!  
Stitch this darling quilt for that person who just means the world to you...a perfect way to express just how much you love them! 
Choose from different finishing options...and if you REALLY want to make it easy, whip up the easy pieced version and it’ll be ready to wrap around your favorite someone in no time! 

"YOU ARE.... the cheese to my macaroni, the water to my ocean, the beat to my heart, the smile to my face, the horizon to my sky...." and many more sweet sentiments!  

Quilt on cover 48.5" x 67.5"   Smaller quilts 38" x 54" and 44" x 60"
-Choice of appliqué or NO appliqué
-Choice of sashing and borders
-Easy to follow instructions and full-size templates
-Pattern is in booklet form...easy to use!

name: Best Friends quilt pattern
description:
• Wallhanging size 18" x 28"
• Can use wool for some appliqué pieces

"Friendship is not a big thing....it's a million little things"

The perfect little quilt to make for your best friend!
“Oooh, you’re the best friend, that I ever had, 
I’ve been with you such a long time...” 
(can you hear the music playing by the band Queen?!)
Just where would we be without our BFF’s? 
Celebrate friendship while stitching up 
all the happy things that friends share.

Pattern includes instructions to make wall-hanging and full-size templates for appliqué.

name: Quiltin' Happy Book
description:
The latest book by the Lizzie B girls...
 "Quiltin' Happy"  ---Quilts that make ya SMILE!

Seven fast, fun, fresh quilts are included in this 32-page book.  Complete instructions with easy-to-follow diagrams and FULL color photos of all the quilts.  That's HAPPY quiltin'!

All the quilts in the book are made from the "Hip Happy" collection of fabrics, designed by the Lizzie B girls.  Colorful brights, combined with blacks and whites...makes these quilts stand out in a crowd.

Quilts include:
Happy Dancin' 69" x 78"
Playful Posies 40" x 48"
Garden Window 60" x 60"
Hopscotch 57" x 79"
Garden Chic 56" x 70"
Paisley Picnic 71" x 84"
Citrus Squeeze 76" x 88"

name: iPad Cover Pattern
description:
Whip up this hip and fun iPad cover... it's so easy!

Made to fit both sizes of iPads, and also will fit a standard composition book.

A soft, but durable cover made to protect your iPad and look CUTE too!  (The inside pocket can be made any size...we made ours to fit an iPhone.)  Button/Loop closure... the iPad is securely cradled inside the cover, and the bottom is open to charge the iPad without having to remove the cover.

This pattern is a PDF download only...it will not be shipped in the mail!  (NO shipping charges!)  After checkout, you'll instantly receive an email from Pulley with a link to download the pattern.  You'll be sewing in no time!

You will need:
---3/8 yard laminated cotton fabric (44” wide; there will be enough to make two covers) 
---3/8 yard cotton fabric for lining (44” wide; there will be enough to make two covers) 
---Fusible fleece, one 12” x 20” piece per cover
---Heavy-duty Template Plastic, OR fine-mesh plastic canvas, 9” x 10” piece per cover 
---1 large button & a 5” piece of narrow elastic for closure

name: "Piece, Love, & Applique" quilt pattern
description:
• Pattern for 62" x 82" finished quilt
• Easy to follow instructions
• Artwork is actual size
• In simple to follow booklet form


Pieced blocks and whimsical appliqué come together to 
Make it “piece-by-piece” or all at once, the choice is yours!  
Complete pattern with diagrams and full-size motifs makes it simple enough for a new-ish quilter.
Choose a color palette---whether retro, bright, primitive, or vintage--- this quilt is sure to become one of your faves.   It’s groovy, baby!

name: "Under a Blanket of Blue" quilt pattern
description:
• Quilt measures 64" x 82"
• Quick & easy piecing technique
• Traditional or quick raw-edge applique

Wrap yourself in this blanket of blue, reminiscent of a warm summer drive through the country. Beautiful blue skies above and field upon field of sunflowers worshipping the sun! Super-easy mosaic piecing combined with your favorite appliqué method... for a touch of summer any time of the year.

name: Greetings from Tucsadelphia BOOK
description:
• 10 unique projects, with complete templates, 112 page book
• Fabulous large and small quilts
• Travel projects... backpack, pouches, luggage tags, pillow!
• Quirky stories, recipe, music list, and more!
• Includes full instructions and templates for all projects
• Softcover, 8 1/2 x 11 inches, 112 pages, full-color

Greetings from TUCSADELPHIA! A place where inspiration flows freely and music floats on the breeze. The air is filled with the scent of freshly baked goodies and laughter rings throughout the land. Thats how Lizzie B sees it! In essence, Tucsadelphia IS wherever Liz and Beth ARE. Let Lizzie B Cre8ive take you on a tour through some of their favorite places. "Greetings from TUCSADELPHIA" is a collection of some of Liz and Beths favorite travel-inspired projects. Like all quilters who travel, Liz and Beth collect FABRIC! They gather fabric from the places they visit and take those bits and weave them into a quilt; like Beths "Happy Hawaii" quilt. They make us smile and feel warm and fuzzy inside as memories of our travels flood back to us. Join them on a sun-drenched beach in "Happy Hawaii" or the bustling streets of "New Yorks Got Soul". Stitch up the quick and "Easy-Breezy Backsack", then take a jaunt through Pennsylvania Amish country. Or pick your own favorite places for the "Wish You Were Here" quilt and adorn it with postcards and memories. Dont forget to bake some "Be Cre8ive Cookies" for your travels, and escape with the Lizzie B playlist. Whether you find time to stitch a little, "Kick Back and Relax" or do some "Peaceful Dreamin" on your own travel pillow, remember that "All Roads Lead to Home". And when it comes to the Lizzie B Girls... all roads lead to Tucsadelphia! We hope you enjoy the journey. Dream big, go far, and always Be Cre8ive! Oh, and if you're wondering where the heck Tucsadelphia is, it's the official city of Lizzie B Cre8ive! Beth lives in Tucson and Liz lives in Philadelphia, hence Tucsadelphia!

name: Dream, Laugh, Create, Inspire NOTECARD SET
description:
• Set of 8 blank notecards & envelopes
• Designs are original hand-quilted images
• 2 each of Dream, Laugh, Create, Inspire
• each card measures 4.25" x 5.5"

Set of 8 blank notecards, 4 different designs are included in each pack. 2 each of "Dream", "Laugh", "Create", and "Inspire". Original quilt designs by Lizzie B Cre8ive. 
Patterns to make the quilts are also available..."Dream a Little Dream" and "Be Creative!" are individual patterns, and "Laugh" and "Inspire" are included within the Whimsyland book.

name: "Be Creative" Quilt Pattern
description:
• Wallhanging size 18" x 28"
• Can use wool for some applique pieces


Whether you're a gardener, painter, or quilter (+ more!), "Be true to yourself" as you express your creativity in this fun wall-hanging! Mix a little wool with some bright quilting scraps, add a few buttons, and you've got the perfect accent to enliven any creative space. For extra inspiration and fabulosity, hang it right next to its sister pattern, "Dream a Little Dream".

Pattern includes instructions to make wall-hanging and full-size templates for appliqué.

name: "A Summer-Coloured Day" quilt pattern
description:
• Quilt measures 32" x 38"
• Features applique and easy piecing
• Artwork is actual size
• Can be done in 3 parts (like a block-of-the-month)

Dreams of drippy ice cream cones, a tall frosted glass of ice cold lemonade, refreshing watermelon, and wonderfully warm & lazy summer days are stitched together in this summer-coloured quilt. No need to rush... this 3-month project allows you time to prop your feet up, read a few good books, stitch a little here and there, and STILL get it finished by summers end!

name: "Spring is in the Air" quilt pattern
description:
• Quilt measures 32" x 38"
• features applique and easy piecing
• can be done in 3 parts (like a block-of-the-month)

Blossoms pop on the trees like popcorn, tulips push their way through the earth, robins lay their eggs, strawberries ripen on the vine and bunnies hop through the garden. Grab the umbrella---it looks like rain; spring is in the air! This 3-month project will make you smile as you stitch the sweet appliqué shapes and easy-pieced blocks...and it will still allow you time for spring cleaning!

name: XOXO quilt pattern
description:
Got LUV? This sweet, romantic quilt is full of heart. Stitch it together with thoughts of your true love...and then cuddle up and share some XOXO!

Finished quilt measures 51" x 51".

This pattern is a PDF download only...it will not be shipped in the mail! (NO shipping charges!) After checkout, you'll instantly receive an email from Pulley with a link to download the pattern. You'll be sewing in no time!

You will need:
2-1/2 yards background fabric
9 different fabrics, 1/4 yard each for hearts
White fabric for sashing, 1/4 yard
Light pink for outer ruffle, 1-1/4 yard
Dark pink for inner ruffle, 5/8 yard

name: "Let There Be Chocolate" quilt pattern
description:
• Set of 8 patterns to make a finished quilt size 46" x 56"
• Artwork is actual size
• Easy to follow instructions

A sweet, yummy quilt to celebrate chocolate for every day of the week! Seven blocks depict a different treat each day, and the eighth and final patterns details how to sew them all together and add the borders.  Set of all 8 patterns is included in the sweet new low price of only $12!

name: "Woman's Gotta Have It" quilt pattern
description:
• Pattern for 42" x 48" quilt
• Easy to follow instructions
• Artwork to scale

Need we say more?!  One look at this quilt and you just “gotta have it”!  Have fun embellishing this wall-hanging, 
the perfect accent to any sewing room.

name: "Will You Remember Me" quilt pattern
description:
• Pattern for 34" x 34" quilt
• Easy to follow instructions
• Artwork to scale


Whimsical curliques embrace your loved ones in this 
memory quilt.   Choose some wonderful fabric as your 
tailor the photo frames to your liking, and stitch away on 
extraordinary family heirloom.

name: "When I Take My Sugar to Tea" quilt pattern
description:
• Pattern for 36" x 46" quilt
• Easy to follow instructions
• Artwork is actual size


You will love stitching this sweet, whimsical tea party.  Choose yummy fabrics for the backgrounds, combine vintage florals with a few checks and stripes for the “good china”, and sit back for an afternoon of quilting and tea....ahhhhhh!

name: "Too Darn Hot" quilt pattern
description:
• Pattern for 22.5" x 24.5" wallhanging
• Artwork to scale
• Easy to follow instructions


Combine whimsical desert images with HOT southwest
colors, and this small quilt is sure to keep you cool!
Easy appliqué... you’ll have it done before the sun sets!

name: "Summer Sunshine" quilt pattern
description:
• Pattern for 40" x 40" quilt
• Easy to follow instructions
• Artwork is actual size


Bright colors of sea and sand surrounded by colorful
flip-flops bring back summer sunshine all year long.
Add some easy chenille for a fun, textured look.
This day at the beach is sure to make you smile!

name: "Someone to Watch Over Me" quilt pattern
description:
• Pattern for 46" x 46" quilt
• Easy to follow instructions
• Artwork is actual size


Create an heirloom with this timeless memory quilt.
Easy layering techniques, combined with hand or 
machine appliqué, make this do-able for any quilter!

name: "Saturday Market" quilt pattern
description:
Quilt measures 35" x 42"
• Can be a 6 part project (block-of-the-month)
• Applique and piecing
• Choose French or English for embroidered words

Streets filled with shoppers, vendors and their colorful displays, the scent of fresh-baked bread wafting through the air--- its Saturday at the market! Inspired by a day of shopping at an outdoor French country market, this quilt represents all the wonderful things a Saturday market has to offer. Fun appliqué shapes combined with bright colorful piecing, simple embroidery and a funky rooster on guard brings the French country market right to your home! Pattern includes embroidered words in French AND English. (Just where would this devilishly handsome rooster go after a long day at market? Why the hen house of course! Check out our"Chick Chatter" pattern to see if the poor rooster gets a word in edgewise!)

name: "A Rose-Tinted Life" quilt pattern
description:
• Pattern for 44" x 58" quilt
• Easy to follow instructions
• Artwork to scale


WOW!  A sure show-stopper with this vibrant, whimsical quilt.  Easy piecing, simple shapes, and bright colors make a statement.

name: "Polka dots and Moonbeams" quilt pattern
description:
• Quilt measures 40" x 54"
• Pattern includes full-size templates
• Easy to follow instructions

Find time to run, jump, sing, read, play, twirl and giggle as you make this bright happy little quilt to remind yourself or someone you love to enjoy the little things in life.

name: "Perfect Harmony" quilt and rug pattern
description:
• Quilt measures 44" x 50", Rug measures 40" round
• Easy to follow instructions
• Full-size templates
• Raw-edge applique technique... easy for a beginner!

A funky, fun throw quilt and a simple, raw-edged comfy rug---both embellished with jumbo rick rack---compliment each other in perfect harmony. Both projects are quick and easy, perfect to add a splash of color to any room!

name: "Peace Throughout the Land" quilt pattern
description:
• Wallhanging size 18" x 28"
• Can use wool for some applique pieces
• Artwork is actual size
• Easy to follow instructions

Cmon, sing-a-long now..... "I'd like to build the world a home, and furnish it with love, grow apple trees & honey bees and snow white turtle doves..."  Inspired by a happy memory of a favorite song, this little quilt reminds us that all we really want is peace throughout the land.

name: "Pajama Game" quilt pattern
description:
• Pattern for finished 52.5" x 52.5" quilt
• Easy to follow instructions
• Artwork is actual size

Throw a pajama party! Grab your girlfriends, don your favorite pjs, and make a game out of stitching this quilt. Follow the advice embroidered on each game-board block and youll get from start to finish in no time!

name: "Listen to Your Heart" quilt pattern
description:
• Pattern for 66" x 82" quilt
• Benefits 501(c)3 Cancer Foundations
• Easy to follow instructions, beginner friendly!
• Artwork is actual size

A special quilt full of warmth and encouraging words for the ones you love affected by cancer. Whether you make this a group project, by yourself, or to donate for a cause; the recipient is sure to feel your love and support.

name: "La Vie en Rose" quilt pattern
description:
• Pattern for 50" x 65" quilt
• Artwork is actual size
• Easy to follow instructions


Shabby-chic raw-edged flowers evoke a vintage look.
Easy piecing and appliqué make quilting fun and fast!
This quilt will easily become one of your favorites...

name: "Jave Jive" quilt pattern
description:
• Pattern for 40"x40" quilt
• Easy to follow instructions
• Artwork is actual size
• Applique and piecing


Our funky java quilt contains all the elements you need 
for a good cuppa joe -- rich, dark colors combined with retro brights -- you can almost smell the coffee brewing!  Choose paper-pieced borders, or an easy strippy method instead.  Either way, it’s sure to be a conversation piece!

name: "Fall is All Around" quilt pattern
description:
• Quilt measures 32" x 38"
• features applique and easy piecing
• can be done in 3 parts (like a block-of-the-month)

The crisp cool air swirls in with a twirl of leaves, apples are ripe for the picking, pumpkins sit on doorsteps, squirrels gather their acorns, a scarecrow watches over the and somewhere the school bell rings. Take time to dance in the falling leaves...fall is all around! Stitch this 3-month project during those crisp fall days...its simple enough to allow you time to enjoy the cooler weather and even start thinking about the upcoming holidays!

name: "Dusky Desert" quilt pattern
description:
• Pattern for 55"x65" quilt
• Easy raw-edged applique technique 
• Easy to follow instructions
• Artwork is actual size


Conjure up the colors of a soft desert sky with this unique quilt.  Simple, raw-edge appliqué makes this quilt fast and easy.  A great keepsake for lovers of the desert!

name: "Dream a Little Dream" quilt pattern
description:
• Wallhanging size 18" x 28"
• Can use wool for some applique pieces

Dream of home, love and family as you stitch this whimsical wall-hanging, embellished with wool and buttons to bring your dream to life. No dream is ever too big or too little... and if you believe in yourself, dreams really can come true! For extra inspiration and fabulosity, hang it right next to its sister pattern, Be Creative!

Pattern includes instructions to make wall-hanging and full-size templates for appliqué.

name: "Daydreamin' Daisies" quilt pattern
description:
• Pattern for 54" x 54", or 54" x 90" quilt
• Easy to follow instructions
• Artwork is actual size

For those who dream in Technicolor! A fun & easy piecing technique is used for the background, while traditional or raw-edge appliqué bring bright funky daisies to life. A great quilt to brighten any room! Pattern instructions in 2 sizes... Throw or Twin.

name: "Chick Chatter" quilt pattern
description:
• Quilt measures 30" x 33"
• features applique and piecing
• Can be done in 6 parts (like a block-of-the-month)

Pick a little, talk a little... if theres one thing chicks KNOW how to do, its CHATTER! This companion quilt to our Saturday Market design is full of chicks and some of their most famous chick-chat. Traditional country gets scrambled with the whimsical for a fun project more fulfilling than a four-egg omelet! Easy piecing, big appliqué blocks; add a sprinkling of embroidery and embellishment to bring these chicks to life. (If you think these chicks need a rooster to chatter about, also try our Saturday Market quilt, and let our funky rooster strut his stuff!)

name: "From the Bottom of My Soul" quilt pattern
description:
• Quilt measures 50" x 50"
• Features applique and easy piecing
• All artwork to scale
• easy-to-follow instructions

Swirl up a tad of whimsy with words of inspiration, add a pop of color here and there, and you'll have the perfect quilt to "grace" any room. Create this sweet quilt for a true friend... when you just need to express your feelings from the very bottom of your soul!

name: the "Easy Breezy Backsack" pattern
description:
Easy to follow instructions
Great for a beginner
One size fits both kids and adults
Measures approx 15" square


Making your own whimsical backpack has never been so easy! Whip this one up in no time and make a few extra for friends while youre at it. When the compliments start pouring in you can nonchalantly reply, It was a breeze!

name: "A Merry Little Winter" quilt pattern
description:
• Quilt measures 32" x 38"
• Features applique and easy piecing
• Can be done in 3 parts (like a block-of-the-month)

Imagine the swish of snow under the skis, catching snowflakes on the tongue, warm wooly mittens, and a shiny new sled to take to the hills. The warmth of coming home to a hot cup of cocoa and roasted smores are all wrapped up in this ode to a merry little winter! Settle in by a crackling fire while you work on this 3-month project... its simple enough to finish by the first warm day of spring!

name: the "Anything Goes" bag pattern
description:
Pattern in 2 sizes...handbag or tote
Easy to follow instructions
Artwork is full-size

The first LizzieB handbag pattern where just about ANYTHING goes! Use fun scraps from your stash to put together this bag or tote. Make it jazzy with acrylic handles and an appliqué or two and youll be ready to hit the town!
